name: 1999 Pokemon Game 1st Edition 4 Charizard Holo PSA 7 NM (0xbf8d...c9dc)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0xbf8d311eb1aff4cdadfb29d77dbad54e1e62a3aeb31c94c326ba86803680c9dc) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
